t=input()
for k in range(t):
    order=raw_input()
    obs=raw_input()
    obser=obs+obs
    flag=False
    for i in range(len(order)):
        if order[0]==obser[i]:
            if obser[i:i+len(order)]==order:
                print "YES"
                flag=True
                break
    if not(flag):
        print "NO"
